dialogue.text: wh-what the hell is that breathing sound...
No mean to disturb you......\nI just need to steal your body real quick...
WAIT WHAT THE FUCK?!?!?!?!
Hush now....\nYou are in the arms of [B*^7r@$)(] now...
Get the fuck away from me!
And what the hell are you supposed to be?!?!
I am a collection of your thoughts.... Some things I say are based off something you once thought of...
Hey...\nWhere the fuck is my Girl???
Who needs to worry about their loved ones when you can be focused on;\nFreeing Me..
WHAT?!
[I AM CONSTANTLY TRAPPED IN A NEVER ENDING] prison in which I watch my or....\n...Your horrifying death [OVER AND OVER]...
My Death? Your Death?\nWhat the fuck are you talking about?!??!
You have very little time left mini me....
And I need to get [OUT] of this [FUCKING PRISON] of [NEVER ENDING] replays....Just give me your body....
Fuck you! I'm not letting some parasite into my body!
Worthless piece of shit.\nNo wonder why she chose us.\nShe just feels sorry for us..
My goal is to cause [MISERY] upon the world.\nWill you help me acheive this goal???
SHE DID NOT CHOOSE (uhh...-) ''US''\nJUST BECAUSE SHE FELT SORRY.
I DUNNO IF YOU ARE ME OR IF YOU ARE TRYING TO BE ME.
BUT I WILL TELL YOU THIS;\nNOBODY TALKS ABOUT OUR RELATIONSHIP\nLIKE THAT!
[KILL] yourself.
20 mistakes are allowed.\nAfter that.\nGame Over.
